conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a batman movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
It seems there might be a slight mix-up in your list as 'True Blood' is actually a TV series, not a movie. However, if you're looking for a Batman-themed movie, I'd recommend 'Maleficent' (2014) starring Angelina Jolie Pitt. While it doesn't feature the Dark Knight himself, the film offers an interesting twist on fairy tale villains which might appeal to your taste.

If you're open to science fiction, 'Elysium' (2013) featuring Matt Damon could be another intriguing option, set in a future where the very wealthy live on a space station while the rest of Earth is in ruins. It has a different setting but shares an element of class struggle that some Batman fans might appreciate. Enjoy your movie time!

If you're looking for something with a different atmosphere, "The Breakfast Club" (N/A) could also be an interesting choice. This film revolves around five high school students discovering their shared experiences in Saturday detention.
